title: free rp still a thing?
body:
Is the free 400 rp still a thing or has it been scrapped.
If it is what level do you have to reach to get, I'm level 10 and thought that was when.
pls help I really want veigar in the august sale.
thanks

replies.body: The free RP for new accounts was recently replaced with [New Player Chests ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)for Hextech Crafting.  It looks like the account you are posting from is level 30, but if you have another account check its hextech inventory for a free chest and key!
